title: him by section 27(3) of the Gaming and Lotteries Act 2019 (No. 44 of 2019),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaming and Lotteries (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaming and Lotteries (Amendment) Act 

2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaming lottery (amendment) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: him by section 27(3) of the Gaming and Lotteries Act 2019 (No. 44 of 2019),
heading: 2. The 1st day of December 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of December 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Gaming and Lotteries (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 44 of 2019) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister 
for Justice and Equality, 

24 June, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [227] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
